user_review: Their couscous is really excellent, the broth is deep and tasty and the couscous is cooked just right. Affordable prices and nice service, highly recommend for a comfort meal.
Had a vegetarian couscous to go which comes with a nice salad. Service was quick, food was really good and comforting; just what I was looking for on a cold day! Will definitely come back. Must try!

I love the look and feel of this tiny warm, cozy room for couscous, delicious marinated chicken and steak. I haven't tried everything here but I like popping in for a quick sandwich and a mellow break from the Mile End. I've found the service fairly quick and friendly. At $10 the sandwich with fries and a drink is a great option for lunch in the area.
Stopped here when we were starving.  Nice atmosphere full of warmth and N.Y. jazz music playing.  The marinated lamb and chicken are prepared in a hot pot.  Very delicious.  And try the mint tea!
